item.title: Rearch About Multi Tasking
item.description: Probably the best learning from tracfic school study. ðŸ˜¼ Distraction is not exclusive to driving. In fact, multitasking is a common way that people conduct their lives. Many children do their homework in front of the TV. People take work home from the job site and mingle family time with work time (giving neither of them the attention they deserve). Doing only one thing at a time seems almost lazy in today’s society.
